name: One of a Kind, Customised, Rob Zombie, Studded, Green Denim Waistcoat. U.K Size 12/14/16.
description:
One of a kind, Rock n' Roll, customised Waistcoat from my fashion label Alabama Blue.

Rob Zombie ' The Sinister Urge' Waistcoat. 

I ahve reworked a Mens Denim Jacket. It has been bleached, dip dyed 'Zombie' Green, Studded and I have added a Rob Zombie design from his second album ' The Sinister Urge' as the back panel. 

This is a handmade, completely unique and original design. A must for a Rob Zombie fan!!! 

This is a Mens Denim Jacket. It will fit a size 12-16. On a size 12, it will have a looser fit, the model in the photos is a size 10-12. 

I highly recommend hand washing to protect the studs and the embroidery. 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

name: One of a Kind, Customised Leopard & Lace Denim Waistcoat. U.K Size 12.
description:
One of a kind, Rock n' Roll, customised Denim Waistcoat from my fashion label Alabama Blue.

I have reworked a dark Denim waistcoat by adding a Leopard Print back panel, Black lace side panels and on the front. I have also used Gold studs and added a pink Skull. 

Really cute, versatile waistcoat. Can be worn over a dress for a night out or over a hoody in cold weather!! 

U.K size 12.  

I highly recommend hand washing to protect the studs and embroidery. 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

name: One of a Kind Shorts, Customised, High Waisted, Baby Pink Levi's with Blue Diamonds,34 inch waist.
description:
One of a kind, Rock n' Roll, customised Denim Shorts from my fashion label Alabama Blue.

'Diamonds are a girls best friend' Shorts. 

Marilyn Monroe inspired, unique and original reworked Levi's. 

I have reworked a pair of Sta-Prest White Levi's. I cut them in to shorts, hand dyed them baby Pink and added a baby Blue diamond on the front and one on the back pocket. I have also embroidered 3 little diamonds and stars in White cotton on the shorts. The shorts have also been frayed and been given a worn look. 

As these jeans were Levi's Sta-Prest jeans, they do have a slight line pressed down the centre of the shorts. You can make this out in the photo's, but it does not take away anything from the design of the shorts. 

These jeans were Mens, so they do sit quite high on the waist. The waist measurement is 34 inches. 

I highly recommend hand washing these shorts to protect the embroidery. 

Please contact me if you have any questions.

name: One of a Kind, Customised, Blondie, Dip Dyed, Studded Denim Waistcoat/Jacket, Size Large.
description:
One of a kind, Rock n' Roll, customised Blondie Denim waistcoat.

Re-worked second hand Denim jacket, bleached, dip dyed Turquoise, with a Blondie back panel, studs and Leopard print!!!

Blondie back panel is a jersey material with Debbie Harry design with Blondie spelled out in little blue beads. I have sewn Leopard print cotton on the front in panels and added a Leopard heart to the back, sewn on in Purple cotton. 

Really cool, original and completely unique design. Only one ever made!!! 

The jacket is a Large, would fit size 14-18. The jacket original size is 18, but It can be worn as a looser fit. 

Hand washing is recommended to protect the studs and embroidery. 

Please feel free to ask any questions.

name: One of a kind customised/handmade Barbie, Pink Denim Waistcoat/Jacket, Size 12.
description:
'It's a Doll's Life' Handmade, one of a kind, customised Barbie Denim waistcoat/jacket.

This jacket is super cute, unique and and original design!!!

I have reworked this waistcoat from a second hand denim jacket into a Pink waistcoat by bleaching and dyeing the fabric Pink. The back detail consists of a Barbie fabric motif, really cute buttons that have been hand sewn on and a Leopard print heart. The front of the jacket has been studded with silver studs and on the right of the jacket also has cute buttons hand sewn on. These buttons consist of a ice-cream, star, telephone, cupcake, music note and dog and heart. 

The back Barbie design is white jersey material with a print of Barbie kissing Ken. The buttons along the top consist of stars, smiley face, flowers, dice, roller skates, hot dogs, bowling pins and many more!!!! Check out the pics!

This jacket is hand wash only to protect the studs and buttons. 

The jacket is a size 12. Can also fit a size 10 as it can be worn slightly bigger and still look good!!

Wear the jacket on it's own on a night out and in the summer or with a jacket or hoody underneath when it is cold. 

Show your love for Barbie with this perfect, fun jacket for any doll to stand out in!! 

Completely unique design, only one made!!!
